name: File Player
description: Upload your mp3s at some web accessable folder and stream them through your smart speaker.

properties.text: There are ${media_info.count} results and we are on the ${ordinal( media_info.song_no)} song: ${media_info.current.songTitle}
There is nothing in the playlist
Sorry, I didn't understand that well.

properties.comment: Most probably the player is on

properties.text: You can say "Play Song by Artist", "Play songs from Genre", "Play a Song by Artist", "Play a Song", "Start Playback".

properties.comment: Transfer Intent to search string we can use

properties.text: Could not find any results for the search term ${search}.
Could not find any playlist named ${search_folders}.
Could not find any results. Try again.
To start playing all, say: Play, or Play all
You can say. Play something by Bach
